product.title: Garden City Warm Glow - Roller Blind
product.description: Garden city warm glow allows you to introduce a smattering of hearty tones to your home in just a couple of minutes. relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Garden City Fresh - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Garden city fresh instantly caught their eye, and with good reason. The homely colours bring any space to life, and are everything you need to approach your decor from a completely different angle. As you take a closer look you'll soon see that it offers a subtle layer of depth you didn't see first time around. We love the idea of using city fresh in the kitchen so that the homely shades and hues can add some inspiration when you're perfecting your next culinary creation.

relproducts.title: Cottage Garden Rose - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: As you look at the vibrancy of the reds on display in cottage garden rose, it's easy to forget the beauty of the understated greens. The lack of a black outline allows you to enjoy each colour in relation to its neighbours, and leaves you with an impression of natural simplicity. We love the idea of using garden rose in the upstairs landing so that you can breathe new life into one of the more hard to decorate parts of the home.
